## BaseTextureNode.getType() method

Gets the output type

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected getType(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Empty string (overridden by subclasses)

## Remarks

Subclasses return texture type identifiers like 'tex2D', 'texCube', etc.
